summary: A counterfeiter with a habit of "eliminating" the competition moves in next door to the Robbersons. Two cops move in with the Robbersons for a stakeout.
cast: Chevy Chase|Jack Palance|Dianne Wiest|Robert Davi|David Barry Gray|Jason James Richter|Fay Masterson|Miko Hughes|Richard Romanus|Sal Landi|Ronald L. Schwary|Jack Kehler|Amy Powell|Dawn Landon|Jim Holmes|Charlie O'Donnell|Patrick Patchen|Nelly Bly|Gus Savalas|Preston Hanson|Lena Banks|M. Emmet Walsh
title: Ese poli es un panoli
